thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 12 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Quantenna GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.84

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Quantenna GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.84
text:
Feb 12 (Reuters) - Quantenna Communications Inc:
* QUANTENNA ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FISCAL 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q4 REVENUE ROSE 10 PERCENT TO $41.3 MILLION * QTRLY GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.84 * QTRLY NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.01
* SEES Q1 REVENUE $43 MILLION TO $45 MILLION * SEES Q1 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE IN RANGE $0.06 TO $0.08 * SEES Q1 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE IN RANGE $0.00 TO $0.02
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.03, REVENUE VIEW $41.0 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.01, REVENUE VIEW $42.7 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
